entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -34.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
